td.content: s:43 YO white f dramatist with severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and severe strange behavior. she has had several such episodes over past 4 months. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 48.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:patient presents w/ c/o 6 weeks h/o severe strange behavior, severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and Mental Health. pt is a white f dramatist aged 43 ys. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life Patient is a moderate drinker o:Height 167 cm, Weight 47.6 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg at bedtime.

s:a 45 yr old white F presents w/ c/o 7 weeks h/o severe strange behavior, severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet and Mental Health. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past o:Height 166 cm, Weight 46.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Urine toxicology cocaine (-), PCP (+),TCAs serum concenteration (-) a:Bipolar p:administered ZYPREXA - 10 mg at bedtime, performed Urine toxicology, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
